CustomField.description: GBOM type considering License Keys, to be used for Scratch Order generation
CustomField.formula: IF( isPCI__c, 'NSN Product Configuration Item', IF( (RIGHT(Product_Code__c, 2)= 'LK' || RIGHT(Product__r.Name, 2)= 'LK'), 'License Key', Product_Feature__r.NSNClassification__c ) )
CustomField.label: GBOM Type LK/PCI
